items.text: full on leg stump now, and he nudges it square to deep midwicket once again for a single. Gives Rubel the final two balls of the over
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside off stump, and driven to wide long off. They jog across for a single
items.shortText: de Silva to Rubel Hossain, 1 run

items.text: full toss on middle stump, and Mushfiqur's attempted clip to the leg side goes straight to midwicket. Forces him to get off strike for the next over
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and defended off the front foot. Intercepted by mid on
items.postText: yadvender: "@sreshth --- Why do you have 'x' at the end of your name ? " -- that's my twitter handle!
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: knee-high full toss on middle stump, and Rubel carefully covers his stumps, before defending with the straight bat
items.postText: Ahsan: "Bangladesh must try and bat the full 50 overs and a score around 240 to be competitive "
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.preText: SarfBD: "Isn't it too harsh srini? A bad day can come for any team on any time. After all, this team beat Windies at home in ODIs and T20s in their previous outing."
items.text: there's the five-wicket haul, or is it? Yorker on middle and leg, and the ball hits Rubel's front leg. Huge appeal for lbw, and given by umpire Erasmus. Rubel's walking away, but Mushfiqur calls him back and gives him a earful, forcing his partner to review the decision. And what a good choice from Mushfiqur, because Rubel had inside-edged that shot onto his legs. Rubel survives, thanks to his partner's presence of mind to review.
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, and tapped away to the leg side
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: how does that not hit the stumps! It's a yorker on middle, and Rubel shovels this right into the pitch. The ball bounces up thereafter, but somehow drops away from the stumps
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: slower ball yorker on off stump, and Rubel's attempted defense takes an inside-edge onto his pads
items.shortText: Malinga to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: low full toss on middle, and he muscles an on-drive past the bowler for one
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, and that's been driven down the ground to mid on. Stopped by the infielder
items.shortText: de Silva to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and punched off the back foot to the bowler
items.shortText: de Silva to Rubel Hossain, no run

items.text: full around leg stump, and he goes for a wild slog towards the leg side. Hits his front leg, and the lbw appeal is turned down. They steal a leg bye as well, but Mathews wants to review. It's going to be close if the ball pitched in line. Impact and height makes it look like Rubel is out, but where did the ball pitch? We're waiting... and the impact's in line! Three reds, and Rubel must depart
items.shortText: de Silva to Rubel Hossain, OUT

dismissal.text: Rubel Hossain lbw b de Silva 2 (12b 0x4 0x6) SR: 16.66

items.text: full on off, and angling into his pads. Hits his front leg, and the lbw appeal is turned down by the umpire once again. Mathews wants to review but it looks like a desperate one. Pretty certain it's going down leg, but we wait for the official word.... yep, missing the stumps! Sri Lanka lose a review.
items.postText: OB Jato: "Mushfiqur sweating on his century, Malinga sweating on his five-for..... Entertaining milestone drama!"
items.shortText: de Silva to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: full outside off, and angling into his pads. Takes a big stride forward and defends back to the bowler
items.postText: Sajid: "As Adarsh said, Asia cups should be played in UAE more often than not. World class stadiums, huge diaspora of south asians who loves cricket and they all live peacefully. UAE cricket team will also benefit hugely. "
items.shortText: de Silva to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and tapped down the ground to long on for a single. Commentators are surprised that he actually took the single
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.preText: Bangladesh expose their No. 11 to Suranga Lakmal
items.text: full on off and angling across his body. The Fizz sticks his bat out, and the ball pings his bat's face, only to run down to third man for one
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: there's the sixth ODI hundred! Full on middle, but angling down leg, and Mushfiqur simply glances this fine to place the shot past the keeper's left. Applause in the stands, an ovation from Courtney Walsh as well
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on off, and he walks down the ground to meet this delivery. Flicked away to midwicket for a single
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and he goes for a wild swing across the line. Misses completely
items.postText: That's his first hundred since the 110* at Kimberley last October against South Africa
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: good length on off, and angling further away. Left alone by Mustafizur
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.preText: Uzzy: "Wil Tamim be coming out to bat? " -- No. Tamim is out of the Asia Cup due to a fractured left wrist
items.text: full toss on middle and leg, and Mushfiqur changes his grip and reverse sweeps right over the head of point! The audacity!
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: full and aimed at the stumps. Rahim works it off his boots to square leg for one
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, but angling into the left-hander. Tries to swing across the line, and manages to mistime the shot to deep midwicket
items.shortText: de Silva to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: full on leg stump, and he misses the sweep! Mistimes the shot straight to short fine leg
items.shortText: de Silva to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
